titleStmt.title: Miscellanea, or, Serious, useful considerations, moral, historical, theological together with The characters of a true believer, in paradoxes and seeming contradictions, an essay : also, a little box of safe, purgative, and restorative pils, to be constantly taken by Tho. Goddard, Gent.
titleStmt.author: Goddard, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E.C. for Tho. William ... and Will. Thompson ...,
